{{cpp/title|setfill}}
{{cpp/io/manip/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=iomanip|
template&lt; class CharT &gt;
/*unspecified*/ setfill( CharT c );
}}

When used in an expression {{c|out &lt;&lt; setfill(c)}} sets the fill character of the stream {{c|out}} to {{c|c}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c|new value for the fill character}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{cpp/io/manip/iomanip return value|setfill}}

===Notes===
The current fill character may be obtained with {{lc|std::ostream::fill}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "default fill: [" &lt;&lt; std::setw(10) &lt;&lt; 42 &lt;&lt; "]\n"
              &lt;&lt; "setfill('*'): [" &lt;&lt; std::setfill('*')
                                   &lt;&lt; std::setw(10) &lt;&lt; 42 &lt;&lt; "]\n";
}
|output=
default fill: [        42]
setfill('*'): [********42]
}}

{{dr list end}}
